name: Soundst Newsletter generator
author: Sound Strategies, Inc

sections.description: This plugin generates the HTML required by third-party newsletter services based on the rules set up by the administrator and a specific date range of posts.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ss-newsletter-generator folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Adjust the plugin settings
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

Newsletter admin preview style fix

1.0.1

Fixing displaying generated letter

1.0.0

This is the initial build that was released to the WordPress community
